  <description>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_103139</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_103139</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Recombinaison de la lumière - deux prismes d'orientation  opposée</string>
            <string language="en">Light recombination - two prisms of opposite orientation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helle Rekombination - zwei Prismen 
gegenüberliegende Lagebestimmung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recombination claro - dois prismas da orientação
oposta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ricombinazione chiara - due prismi 
dell'orientamento opposto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαφρύς επανασυνδυασμός - δύο πρίσματα του αντίθετου 
προσανατολισμού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Recombinación ligera - dos prismas de 
orientación opuesta</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Seconde sur trois illustrations sur la  recombinaison de la lumière en utilisant le rayon de lumière blanche et un prisme qui peuvent être utilisés comme exercice de traçage de rayon.  Montré ici est un rayon de lumière banche incident dans deux prismes d'orientation opposée.</string>
            <string language="en">Second of three illustrations on light recombination using white light ray and prism which can be used as ray tracing exercise.  Shown here is a white light ray incident to two prisms of opposite orientation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">recombinaison de la lumière</string>
            <string language="en">light recombination</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">prismes</string>
            <string language="en">prisms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">traçage de rayon</string>
            <string language="en">ray tracing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réfraction</string>
            <string language="en">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">spectre</string>
            <string language="en">spectrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière blanche</string>
            <string language="en">white light</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von drei Abbildungen auf heller 
Rekombination mit weißem hellem Strahl und Prisma, die als 
verfolgenübung des Strahls benutzt werden können. Hier gezeigt
ein weißes Ereignis des hellen Strahls zu zwei Prismen 
gegenüberliegender Lagebestimmung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de três ilustrações no recombination
claro usando o raio claro e o prisma brancos que podem ser usados como
o exercício seguindo do raio. É mostrado aqui um incident 
branco do raio claro a dois prismas da orientação oposta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di tre illustrazioni sulla 
ricombinazione chiara usando raggio luminoso e prisma bianchi che 
possono essere usati come esercitazione seguente del raggio. È 
indicato qui un avvenimento bianco del raggio luminoso a due prismi 
dell'orientamento opposto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη τριών απεικονίσεων στον ελαφρύ επανασυνδυασμό
που χρησιμοποιεί την άσπρα ελαφριά ακτίνα και το πρίσμα που 
μπορούν να χρησιμοποιηθούν ως άσκηση επισήμανσης ακτίνων. 
Εμφανισμένο εδώ είναι ένα άσπρο γεγονός ελαφριών ακτίνων
σε δύο πρίσματα του αντίθετου προσανατολισμού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de tres ilustraciones en la 
recombinación ligera usando el rayo ligero y el prisma blancos que se
pueden utilizar como ejercicio que rastrea del rayo. Se muestra 
aquí un incidente blanco del rayo ligero a dos prismas de 
orientación opuesta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">helle Rekombination</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prismen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlverfolgung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spektrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">weißes Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">recombination claro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">prismas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">traçado do raio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reflexão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">luz branca</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
